text: “Atrivim uabɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir God bagha, uan ifongiamɨn gɨn mangamin ofa a danɨngam, kar ofan bar isia mɨghɨrim ko, God ko navir vamɨran ikiamin ofaba, a da isɨ a uan ifongiamɨn gɨn mangamin ofabar mɨn, da inigh izɨ. Dughiar kamɨn, me a bagh namba 2ɨn dɨvazimɨn aruem anadi naghɨn itir tiar akam kuightɨ, an aven mangɨgham. Egh a uan ofan bar isia mɨghɨrim ko, God ko navir vamɨran ikiamin ofabar amuam, mati a zurara Sabatɨn dughiabar ofa gami moghɨra, an ofabar amuam. Egh a uam azenan mangɨtɨ, me tiam dukuagh.”
